data.eml:eml: Taxonomic description and 3 D modelling of a new species of myzostomid (Annelida, Myzostomida) associated with black corals from Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Terrana, Lucas, Eeckhaut, Igor (2017): Taxonomic description and 3 D modelling of a new species of myzostomid (Annelida, Myzostomida) associated with black corals from Madagascar. Zootaxa 4244 (2): 277-295, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.2.9
